name: Dream Bike V2: Dirt Bike Racin
name_original: Dream Bike V2: Dirt Bike Racin
description:
Dream Bike V2: Dirt Bike Racing is a 3D motor Bike racing game. Smash your way to collect boosts to clear a destructive path through traffic!.
Features :
Gorgeous visual effects
Smooth game controlling experience
Exciting background music
Real-sampling engine sound
Smooth operating experience
Variety of powerful Bike models
More power-ups in the game
Various and complex motor bike racing tracks
More realistic 3D effects
Special Bikes
